title: Create Notflix - Netflix parody with custom film uploads

requirements.text: Create a Netflix-inspired visual design with a dark theme (black background, red accents), matching Netflix's typography and layout patterns including hero banner, horizontal scrolling film rows, and similar navigation structure

quotes: it looks very, very similar to Netflix

acceptanceCriteria: Dark color scheme with black background and red accent colors similar to Netflix branding
Hero banner section displaying featured content at the top of the page
Multiple horizontal scrolling rows for browsing films by category
Navigation bar with Notflix branding matching Netflix's layout style
Film thumbnails with hover effects showing title and brief description

requirements.text: Implement film upload functionality allowing users to submit their own fake films with title, description, thumbnail image, and video file

quotes: I can upload my own films to

acceptanceCriteria: Upload form accepting film title, description, genre/category, thumbnail image, and video file
Backend storage of film metadata and associated media files
Validation of required fields before submission
Success confirmation after successful upload
Uploaded films appear in the browsing interface

requirements.text: Create a film browsing interface displaying all uploaded films organized by categories in horizontal scrolling rows, similar to Netflix's content discovery pattern

quotes: it looks very, very similar to Netflix

acceptanceCriteria: Films organized into horizontal scrolling rows by category or genre
Thumbnail images for each film with title overlay on hover
Smooth horizontal scrolling navigation for each row
Clicking a film opens detailed view or playback interface
Responsive layout adapting to different screen sizes

requirements.text: Build a video playback interface that displays the selected film with standard video controls (play, pause, seek, volume, fullscreen)
acceptanceCriteria: Full-screen video player with custom controls matching Netflix aesthetic
Play/pause, seek bar, volume control, and fullscreen toggle
Display film title and description in the player interface
Back button to return to browsing view
Video streams uploaded film content from backend storage

requirements.text: Design and implement the Notflix logo and branding that parodies Netflix's visual identity while maintaining a distinct identity

quotes: looks very, very similar to Netflix

acceptanceCriteria: Notflix logo prominently displayed in navigation bar
Logo design references Netflix style but clearly distinguishes as Notflix
Consistent branding throughout the application
Red color scheme matching Netflix aesthetic

constraints: Must use React with TypeScript for frontend
Must use Motoko for backend with single-actor architecture
All files must be stored and served through the Internet Computer backend
nonGoals: Real Netflix content or licensed media
User authentication or multi-user accounts (use Internet Identity if auth is needed)
Streaming quality adaptation or DRM protection
Social features like ratings, reviews, or sharing

required: Notflix logo with red lettering on transparent background, Netflix-inspired typography (notflix-logo.dim_300x100.png)
Hero banner background image with dark cinematic gradient (hero-banner.dim_1920x800.png)
Placeholder film thumbnail for empty states showing film reel icon (placeholder-thumbnail.dim_300x450.png)
